mapper.select: SELECT a1.activityNum, a1.cityNum, cityName, activityName, activityTypeName, activityDetail, detailNum, price, totalTime, titleImgname, zip, addr1, addr2, partnerTradeName, partnerInfo FROM activity a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN activityDetail a2 ON a1.activityNum = a2.activityNum LEFT OUTER JOIN city c ON a1.cityNum = c.cityNum LEFT OUTER JOIN partner p ON a1.partnerNum = p.partnerNum WHERE a1.activityNum = #{activityNum}

SELECT userId, name, email, tel, totalMileage FROM ( SELECT me.userId, userName name, email, tel, NVL(totalMileage, 0)totalMileage, mileageDate FROM member me LEFT OUTER JOIN mileage mi ON me.userId = mi.userId WHERE me.userId = #{userId} ORDER BY mileagedate DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 1
SELECT a1.activityNum, activityName, detailNum, price, titleImgname FROM activity a1 LEFT OUTER JOIN activityDetail a2 ON a1.activityNum = a2.activityNum WHERE a1.activityNum = #{activityNum}
